name: OR_LOG_RTLS
description: This table contains information about a procedure's Real-Time Location System (RTLS) tracking.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RTLS_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID tied to the RTLS badge.

columns.name: RTLS_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the start time of the RTLS event and is part of a related group storing raw RTLS data for audit purposes. The time stored here does not necessarily reflect the staff or surgeon's time on the log.

columns.name: RTLS_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the end time of the RTLS event and is part of a related group storing raw RTLS data for audit purposes. The time stored here does not necessarily reflect the staff or surgeon's time on the log.
